title: Something I hope for tarics rework
body:
I hope they let him still be a juggersupport. the low mobility and high-ish damage plus some general utility is what makes him beautiful.

also can he not be super gimmicky like most the other reworks have been, keep him pretty simple, new players need champions too.

replies.body: Sirchez would be sad to see this champ get messed up xD He likes to play Taric Top quite often haha.
